metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1335 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: From Apache Tika versions 1.7 to 1.17, clients could send carefully craftedheaders to tika-server that could be used to inject commands into thecommand line of the server running tika-server. This vulnerability onlyaffects those running tika-server on a server that is open to untrustedclients. The mitigation is to upgrade to Tika 1.18.

criterions.comment: tika package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
